name: Senka Legend - The Three Visit
desc: Send this card to the GY during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation. During your Main Phase, if you Normal or Special Summon a "Senka" monster(s): You can target 1 of those monsters; add from your Deck to your hand 1 "Senka" monster with a different name from that target. If this card is sent from the Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Senka" monster from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Senka Legend - The Three Visit" once per turn.
